item.description:
Sunday, June 5: 1-4 p.m.

FREE Learn-to-Open Water-Row Event at Little Harbor Boathouse

Little Harbor Boathouse Open Water Rowing & Paddling Center

40 Doaks Lane, Marblehead, MA 

Little Harbor Boathouse joins U.S. Rowing’s National Learn-to-Row Day hosting a free Learn-To-Open-Water-Row Event to kick-off 2011 Adult and Teen Summer Rowing Programs and Camps under the direction of Ryan DC Banks (formerly Director of Programming & Development at Community Rowing, Inc, Boston). Free community-wide event! For experienced rowers come meet Echo Open Water Rowing Team Coach Brian Chorney and go for a group row. Learn-to-Row Basics for beginners.  Meet Ryan Banks, Little Harbor Boathouse coaching staff, and register for programs. 

For more information on Little Harbor Boathouse Private Small Boat Storage Memberships, Team Echo Rowing & Programs for Adults and Teens visit: rowingforall.com

For Adult & Teen Rowing Program questions call: Ryan Banks: 617-599-9951; r.d.banks@gmail.com

Come join us: Sunday, June 5: 1-4 p.m.
item.how_to_find_us: LH Boathouse is located in the Little Harbor Office Building, 40 Doaks Lane entrance, Marblehead MA or accessed off Gas House Beach Lane.

group.name: Rowing Gals Community Rowing & Paddling Meetup

item.name: Free North Shore Open Water Learn-to-Row Event
